Try adding %JUNIT_HOME%\junit to your classpath, since the samples folder i=
s
under the junit  folder.

i.e.   CLASSPATH=3D.;%JUNIT_HOME%\junit;%JUNIT_=
HOME%\junit.jar;%JUNIT_HOME%\;
etc
